name: Jquery.messagebox
body:
### Welcome to jquery.messageBox Pages.
jquery.messageBox is a simple system that allows you to add dialogBox or messageBox to your applications / HTML sites.
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the jquery.messageBox for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Usage
First, load jQuery and the plugin:
`
<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script src="js/jquery.messagebox.js"></script>
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
